00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 
00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _dataspace{
00015         t_object                ob;     
00016         void                    *obex;
00017         void                    *outlet_active;
00018         void                    *outlet_native;
00019         DataspaceLib    *dataspace;
00020         long                    ac;                                             // for return values from the dataspace conversion
00021         t_atom                  *av;                                    //      ...
00022         t_symbol                *attr_dataspace;                // name of the dataspace -- e.g. "temperature"
00023         t_symbol                *attr_dataspace_active; // name of the current unit within the dataspace -- e.g. "celsius"
00024         t_symbol                *attr_dataspace_native; // name of the desired native unit within the dataspace -- e.g. "celsius"
00025 } t_dataspace;
00026 
00027 
00028 // Prototypes for methods
00029 void*           dataspace_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00030 void            dataspace_free(t_dataspace *obj);
00031 void            dataspace_assist(t_dataspace *obj, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00032 void            dataspace_int(t_dataspace *obj, long x);
00033 void            dataspace_float(t_dataspace *obj, double x);
00034 void            dataspace_getDataspaces(t_dataspace *obj);
00035 void            dataspace_getUnits(t_dataspace *obj);
00036 t_max_err       dataspace_setDataspace(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00037 t_max_err       dataspace_setDataspaceActive(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00038 t_max_err       dataspace_setDataspaceNative(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00039 
00040 
00041 // Globals
00042 t_class         *dataspace_class;
00043 
00044 
00045 /************************************************************************************/
00046 // Main() Function
00047 
00048 int main(void)
00049 {
00050         t_class *c;
00051         
00052         jamoma_init();
00053 
00054         // Define our class
00055         c = class_new("jcom.dataspace",(method)dataspace_new, (method)dataspace_free, (short)sizeof(t_dataspace), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00056         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_dataspace, obex));
00057 
00058         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00059 
00060         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_int,                       "int",                  A_GIMME, 0L);
00061         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_float,                     "float",                A_GIMME, 0L);
00062         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_getDataspaces,     "dataspaces.get", 0);
00063         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_getUnits,          "units.get",            A_GIMME, 0);
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_assist,            "assist",               A_CANT, 0L); 
00065     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",              A_CANT,0);  
00066     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref",             A_CANT, 0);
00067 
00068         class_addattr(c, 
00069                 attr_offset_new("dataspace", _sym_symbol, 0,
00070                 (method)0, (method)dataspace_setDataspace, calcoffset(t_dataspace, attr_dataspace)));
00071         class_addattr(c, 
00072                 attr_offset_new("unit.active", _sym_symbol, 0,
00073                 (method)0, (method)dataspace_setDataspaceActive, calcoffset(t_dataspace, attr_dataspace_active)));
00074         class_addattr(c, 
00075                 attr_offset_new("unit.native", _sym_symbol, 0,
00076                 (method)0, (method)dataspace_setDataspaceNative, calcoffset(t_dataspace, attr_dataspace_native)));
00077 
00078         // Finalize our class
00079         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00080         dataspace_class = c;
00081         return 0;
00082 }
00083

00085 /************************************************************************************/
00086 // Object Life
00087 
00088 void *dataspace_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00089 {
00090         t_dataspace *obj;                                                                       // Declare an object (based on our struct)
00091 
00092         obj = (t_dataspace *)object_alloc(dataspace_class);             // Create object, store pointer to it (get 1 inlet free)
00093         if(obj){
00094                 object_obex_store((void *)obj, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(obj,NULL));
00095             obj->outlet_native = outlet_new(obj, 0);
00096             obj->outlet_active = outlet_new(obj, 0);
00097                 obj->dataspace = NULL;
00098                 obj->attr_dataspace_active = _sym_nothing;
00099                 obj->attr_dataspace_native = _sym_nothing;
00100 
00101                 attr_args_process(obj, argc, argv);
00102                 if(!obj->dataspace)
00103                         object_attr_setsym(obj, gensym("dataspace"), gensym("temperature"));
00104 
00105                 obj->av = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom));       // just allocating one for now -- no list support
00106         }
00107         return obj;                                                                             // Return pointer to our instance
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 void dataspace_free(t_dataspace *obj)
00112 {
00113         sysmem_freeptr(obj->av);
00114         if(obj->dataspace)
00115                 delete obj->dataspace;
00116 }

00119 /************************************************************************************/
00120 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00121 
00122 // Method for Assistance Messages
00123 void dataspace_assist(t_dataspace *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00124 {
00125         if(msg==1)                                                      // Inlets
00126                 strcpy(dst, "x");
00127         else if(msg==2){                                        // Outlets
00128                 switch(arg){
00129                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "y=f(x)"); break;
00130                         default: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00131                 }
00132         }
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 void dataspace_int(t_dataspace *obj, long x)
00137 {
00138         dataspace_float(obj, (double)x);
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 void dataspace_float(t_dataspace *obj, double x)
00143 {
00144         t_atom  a[1];
00145         
00146         atom_setfloat(a, x);
00147         obj->dataspace->convert(1, a, &obj->ac, &obj->av);
00148         outlet_anything(obj->outlet_native, _sym_float, obj->ac, obj->av);
00149         outlet_float(obj->outlet_active, x);
00150 }
00151         
00152 
00153 void dataspace_getDataspaces(t_dataspace *obj)
00154 {
00155         t_atom          a[2];
00156         t_symbol        **dataspaceNames = NULL;
00157         long            numDataspaces = 0;
00158         long            i;
00159         
00160         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00161         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("DataspacesMenu"), 1, a);
00162         
00163         jamoma_getDataspaceList(&numDataspaces, &dataspaceNames);
00164         
00165         for(i=0; i<numDataspaces; i++){
00166                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00167                 atom_setsym(a+1, dataspaceNames[i]);
00168                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("DataspacesMenu"), 2, a);
00169         }
00170         
00171         if(numDataspaces)
00172                 sysmem_freeptr(dataspaceNames);
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 void dataspace_getUnits(t_dataspace *obj)
00177 {
00178         t_atom          a[2];
00179         t_symbol        **unitNames = NULL;
00180         long            numUnits = 0;
00181         long            i;
00182         
00183         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00184         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("UnitMenu"), 1, a);
00185         
00186         obj->dataspace->getAvailableUnits(&numUnits, &unitNames);
00187         
00188         for(i=0; i<numUnits; i++){
00189                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00190                 atom_setsym(a+1, unitNames[i]);
00191                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("UnitMenu"), 2, a);
00192         }
00193         
00194         if(numUnits)
00195                 sysmem_freeptr(unitNames);
00196 }

00199 // ATTRIBUTE:
00200 t_max_err dataspace_setDataspace(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00201 {
00202         obj->attr_dataspace = atom_getsym(argv);
00203         jamoma_getDataspace(obj->attr_dataspace, &obj->dataspace);
00204         obj->attr_dataspace_active = obj->dataspace->neutralUnit;
00205         obj->attr_dataspace_native = obj->dataspace->neutralUnit;
00206         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 // ATTRIBUTE:
00211 t_max_err dataspace_setDataspaceActive(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00212 {
00213         obj->attr_dataspace_active = atom_getsym(argv);
00214         obj->dataspace->setInputUnit(obj->attr_dataspace_active);
00215         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 // ATTRIBUTE:
00220 t_max_err dataspace_setDataspaceNative(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00221 {
00222         obj->attr_dataspace_native = atom_getsym(argv);
00223         obj->dataspace->setOutputUnit(obj->attr_dataspace_native);
00224         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00225 }
